entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Constant string field data is duplicated when accessed from the same assembly #57185
  • Method group is not classified as "method name" when assigned to Delegate #57184

Closed

  • csc failed while building (Span<T> element comparing) #57148
    17.1
  • Regression - nullable suppression doesn't fix nullability exhaustiveness warnings in switches over tuple expressions #51904
    17.1
  • Nullability warnings should be removed if checked in linq expressions #33473
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57182
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Fix DAG crash with removable numerical test following type test #57173
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Honor suppression on tuple element in switch #57118
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Add TypeScript External Access API for document highlighting, signature help #57168
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure we don't throw when we filter an incomplete list to be empty #57160
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57183
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57186
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Completion options4 #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update to ICSharpCode.Decompiler 7.1.0.6543 #53304
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
